mapper.select:
select tot.*,tat.V_APP_NAME,tsub.USER_NAME,tpa.V_PAY_NAME from t_order_tab tot left join t_app_tab tat on tot.V_BELONG_APP = tat.ID left join t_sys_user_base tsub on tot.V_BELONG_USER = tsub.USER_ID left join t_pay_account tpa on tot.V_BELONG_ACCOUNT = tpa.ID
AND (tat.V_USER_ID = #{USER_ID} or tsub.USER_ID = #{USER_ID})
AND tsub.USER_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{USER_NAME}, '%')
AND tat.V_APP_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{V_APP_NAME}, '%')
AND tot.V_ORDER_NO like CONCAT('%', #{V_ORDER_NO}, '%')
order by tot.V_CREATE_TIME desc
mapper.update: update t_account_collection set V_TOTAL_MONEY = V_TOTAL_MONEY + #{V_MONEY} , V_WX_MONEY =V_WX_MONEY+#{WX_MONEY}, V_ALI_MONEY = V_ALI_MONEY + #{ALI_MONEY}, V_PAY_NUM = V_PAY_NUM + 1 where V_ACCOUNT_ID = #{V_ACCOUNT_ID}

update t_bond_today set V_LOCK_MONEY = V_LOCK_MONEY + #{V_LOCK_MONEY} , V_SURPLUS_BOND = V_SURPLUS_BOND + #{SURPLUS_BOND}, V_COUNT_RECEIVABLES = V_COUNT_RECEIVABLES + #{V_MONEY} , V_WX_RECEIVABLES =V_WX_RECEIVABLES+#{WX_MONEY}, V_ALI_RECEIVABLES = V_ALI_RECEIVABLES + #{ALI_MONEY} where V_USER_ID = #{V_USER_ID}
update t_account_show set V_PAY_NUM =V_PAY_NUM + #{V_PAY_NUM} , V_PAY_TIME = now() where V_ACCOUNT_ID = #{V_ACCOUNT_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT sum(tot.V_MONEY) V_MONEY , tat.V_APP_NAME, sum(tct.V_MONEY) COMMISSION_MONEY, sum(tct.V_FORMALITIES) FORMALITIES_MONEY, sum(tct.V_REALITY) REALITY_MONEY,tot.V_BELONG_APP, sum(tclt.V_CASH_COLLECTION) V_CASH_COLLECTION FROM( select sum(V_MONEY) V_MONEY ,V_BELONG_APP from t_order_tab WHERE 1 = 1 AND TO_DAYS(V_CREATE_TIME) = TO_DAYS(now()) AND( V_STATUS = '1' OR V_STATUS = '3' ) GROUP BY V_BELONG_APP)tot LEFT JOIN t_app_tab tat ON tot.V_BELONG_APP = tat.ID LEFT JOIN t_commission_tab tct ON tat.ID = tct.V_APP_ID AND tct.V_STATUS = '1' AND TO_DAYS(tct.V_COMMISSION_TIME) = TO_DAYS(now()) LEFT JOIN T_COLLECTION_TAB tclt on tot.V_BELONG_APP = tclt.V_APP_ID GROUP BY tot.V_BELONG_APP ORDER BY tat.V_APP_NAME DESC

SELECT sum(tot.V_MONEY) V_MONEY , tsub.USER_NAME , sum(tut.V_MONEY) TOPUP_MONEY , sum(twt.V_MONEY) WITHDRAW_MONEY , sum(tbt.V_SURPLUS_BOND) V_SURPLUS_BOND FROM ( SELECT sum(tot.V_MONEY) V_MONEY , tot.V_BELONG_USER FROM t_order_tab tot WHERE TO_DAYS(tot.V_CREATE_TIME) = TO_DAYS(now()) AND( tot.V_STATUS = '1' OR tot.V_STATUS = '3' ) GROUP BY tot.V_BELONG_USER ) tot LEFT JOIN t_sys_user_base tsub ON tot.V_BELONG_USER = tsub.USER_ID LEFT JOIN t_user_topup tut ON tot.V_BELONG_USER = tut.V_TOPUP_USER AND tut.V_STATUS = '1' AND TO_DAYS(tut.V_TOPUP_TIME) = TO_DAYS(now()) LEFT JOIN t_withdraw_tab twt ON tot.V_BELONG_USER = twt.V_APPLY_USER AND twt.V_STATUS = '1' AND TO_DAYS(twt.V_APPLY_TIME) = TO_DAYS(now()) LEFT JOIN t_bond_today tbt ON tbt.V_USER_ID = tot.V_BELONG_USER GROUP BY tot.V_BELONG_USER ORDER BY tsub.USER_NAME DESC
